https://www.ndtv.com/india-news/pahalgam.question: What is the news about?
https://www.ndtv.com/india-news/pahalgam.answer: The news is about the Pahalgam Terror Attack in Jammu and Kashmir, where 26 people were killed. The attack has led to a high-level security meeting chaired by Prime Minister Narendra Modi, and India has responded with non-military measures against Pakistan, including a freeze on the Indus Waters Treaty and cancellation of visas.

https://www.ndtv.com/india-news/pahalgam.question: Title?
https://www.ndtv.com/india-news/pahalgam.answer: The title is: "Pahalgam Terror Attack Updates: PM Modi's High-Level Security Meet To Begins"
